translation.en: [woman 1] Newton's first law of motion.
An object at rest, stays at rest.
translation.ko: 정지 상태의 물체는 정지 상태를 유지하려 하고

translation.en: And an object in motion, stays in motion.
Basically, bodies keep on doing what they're doing.
translation.ko: 기본적으로 우리 몸은 하던 일을 계속하려고 하는데

translation.en: It's simple. If you want to accelerate, you need more force.
translation.ko: 원리는 간단해 가속하려면 힘이 더 필요한 거지

translation.en: I love laws. In physics and in life.
So I became a lawyer.
And why Mergers and Acquisitions? Because I've always wanted to be the best.
translation.ko: 인수합병을 택한 이유? 항상 최고를 꿈꾸기 때문이지

translation.en: The toughest, smartest corporate lawyers do M&A.
translation.ko: 강하고 똑똑한 고문 변호사는 인수합병으로 모이니까

translation.en: And a girl like me really needs to stay tough in a city like this.
translation.ko: 게다가 나 같은 여자는 이런 도시에서 강해야 살아남거든

translation.en: See? Exhibit A.
I know if I work harder than anyone else, apply more force, I'll make partner.
translation.ko: 누구보다 열심히 노력한다면 나도 파트너가 될 수 있어

translation.en: They say being on the partner track
translation.ko: 파트너 트랙에 오르면 진정한 자신을 알게 된다고 하지

translation.en: -is how you find out who you really are. -[mobile rings]
translation.ko: 파트너 트랙에 오르면 진정한 자신을 알게 된다고 하지 "레이철 프리드먼"

translation.en: Sorry. I'm coming up now. Sorry, I'm--
-[woman 2] You're doing it again. -What? Oh right.
Guys never apologize. Sorry.
You know what else guys never do? Apologize for apologizing.
translation.ko: 또 안 하는 게 뭔 줄 알아? 사과했다고 사과하는 거야

translation.en: It's Waffle Wednesday.
You know I love waffles, but forget me. Save yourself.
translation.ko: 나도 와플 좋아하지만 됐어 너 많이 먹어

translation.en: Don't think I won't. I've sold my soul for a lot less than artisanal baked goods.
translation.ko: 당연하지, 그저 그런 빵에도 내 영혼을 팔았는데 뭐

translation.en: I need a new case, stat.
What? I just wrapped the Weiland deal. I need to staff ASAP.
translation.ko: 왜? 웨일랜드 건도 해결했으니 빨리 새로운 일 찾아야지

translation.en: You have seriously worked nonstop for six years.
It's in the bag.
M&A's only promoting two, maybe three junior partners this year.
translation.ko: 올해 인수합병 쪽에선 두세 명만 승진할 거야

translation.en: Right. You, Dan, and Todd.
Maybe. We're neck and neck.
Look. I just need one more heavyweight to lock it in.
translation.ko: 센 거 한 방이면 확실히 할 수 있는데

translation.en: You won't lose junior partner 'cause you're not staffed for one day.
translation.ko: 하루 일 안 한다고 주니어 파트너 떨어질 일 없어

translation.en: I've been for two weeks.
Objection. Motive.
-You want to coast. -Mm-hmm.
-Girl, you need to relax. -Look, I can't.
translation.ko: - 너도 좀 쉬어야 해 - 안 된다니까

translation.en: I have to land a major deal before they decide who's making partner.
translation.ko: 파트너 결정하기 전에 거래 성사시켜야 한다고

translation.en: [woman 2] I'm in Litigation, but if you want intel on deal flow,
translation.ko: 난 소송 담당이잖아 거래 관련 정보가 궁금하면

translation.en: your Mean Girls should have the hot goss.
translation.ko: 말 많은 녀석들은 뭐라도 알고 있지 않겠어?

translation.en: She turns around, she was a total bakkushan.
translation.ko: 그녀가 등을 돌렸는데 완전 뒤태 미인이더라니까

translation.en: -[man 1] Oh. -Oh God. What is a bakkushan?
A wide margin on the face-body quotient.
As used in a sentence, "The bar was so dark,
translation.ko: 예를 들자면 이런 거지 '댄은 바가 너무 어두워서'

translation.en: Dan didn't notice his date was a bakkushan until it was too late."
translation.ko: '데이트 상대가 뒤태 미인인 걸 너무 늦게 알아차렸다'

translation.en: It means she looked like you from the back.
translation.ko: 뒤에서 봤을 때 너처럼 예쁘다는 뜻이야

translation.en: But Dan from the front.
-To my disappointment, she wasn't you. -Clearly. She was on a date with you.
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 네가 아니더라고 - 당연하지, 네 데이트 상대였다며

translation.en: -[men chuckle] -Are you coming?
-There's Marty Adler. -And half the management committee.
translation.ko: - 저기 마티 애들러야 - 운영위원회도 절반이나 있어

translation.en: It's hard to carry this firm on my shoulders, guys. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 로펌을 이끌어 간다는 게 쉽지는 않네요

translation.en: Looks like Marty's rain dance paid off.
translation.ko: 마티의 기우제가 빛을 발하는 거 같네

translation.en: Marty's not a rainmaker, he's a kingmaker.
Whoever gets on his deal wins the golden ticket.
translation.ko: 마티의 거래를 맡으면 누구나 황금 티켓의 주인공이 되지

translation.en: They're still promoting everyone who's tracking, right?
translation.ko: 대열에 오른 사람은 전부 승진하는 거 맞지?

translation.en: What do you have to worry about, Mr. Gretchen Landrus?
translation.ko: 그레첸 도련님께서 걱정하실 일도 있나 봐?

translation.en: -Then there's London Boy. -Yeah, we got a new transfer.
translation.ko: - 런던에서 온 친구도 있잖아 - 맞아, 새로 온 사람 있더라

translation.en: Into M&A? Now?
And I'm stuck on that Pharma Co. deal.
translation.ko: 근데 난 제약 회사 건에 발이 묶여버렸잖아

translation.en: Whichever of you gets to work with Marty will be guaranteed to make partner.
translation.ko: 마티랑 일하는 사람은 무조건 파트너 되는 거라니까

translation.en: That would be me. You know I love all you bakkushans, but…
translation.ko: 그럼 나겠네 우리 뒤태 미인들을 아끼지만

translation.en: this one's mine.
-[sighs] -Go. Land that deal.
Waffles, anyone?
I have your mother on the line.
I'll call her back later,
and I need all the intel on Marty Adler's new deal.
translation.ko: 마티의 새로운 거래에 대한 정보 좀 전부 모아줘요

translation.en: [woman 3] Your new paralegal.
The hell is this?
HR finally realized that giving Ingrid all the paralegals of color may be racist.
translation.ko: 인사팀에서 유색인종 법률 보조를 보내는 게 잉그리드에게 인종차별일 수 있다면서

translation.en: So, this week, she got…
Get your feet off the goddamn desk.
She graduated number two in her class at Harvard Law,
translation.ko: 네가 콜게이트 대학교에서 낙제하고 앉았을 때

translation.en: while your ass was probably flunking Colgate.
Show some freakin' respect.
What, no waffles?
Something way better.
So, who was that Brit you met all those years ago at Rosecliff?
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 로즈클리프에서 만났던 영국 사람 기억해?

translation.en: Rosecliff. Jane and Tony's wedding?
Yeah, you were Maid of Honor at that disaster, but you said you met…
translation.ko: 그래, 네가 들러리였는데 거기서 만났던 사람 있잖아 "카사블랑카"

translation.en: Bogie.
Yeah.
And you guys…
-Yeah. -Yeah.
And you said it was an instant connection. Fireworks. Upstairs bedroom.
translation.ko: 눈 맞아서 위층 침실로 올라갔고 불꽃이 튀었다 했잖아

translation.en: He asked me if I meant what I said in my toast.
About soulmates.
"Belief in true love is the same as believing in God
translation.ko: '진정한 사랑을 믿는 건 신을 믿는 것과 같아요'

translation.en: because you believe in… [inhales] …destiny."
That's when he said you had chocolate on your lips and kissed you.
translation.ko: 그때 입술에 초콜릿이 묻었다며 너한테 키스했고

translation.en: And then he said, "Not chocolate, marzipan…"
-"Pineapple." -"Pineapple." It was nice.
"Nice"? Girl, you said "love at first sight."
You were using soulmate-level language.
He was leaving for London the next day.
translation.ko: 그가 다음 날 런던으로 떠날 예정이어서

translation.en: -So we agreed "no names, no questions." -Uh-huh.
translation.ko: 서로 이름도, 아무것도 묻지 않기로 했지

translation.en: Where did you get that?
The waffle station.
Are you okay?
What is he doing here?
The love of your life from how long ago?
Okay. He's not the love of my life.
-Six years ago. -Oh my God, Ingrid.
This is exactly what you need.
We're gonna be 30, and you've dated a grand total of three guys.
translation.ko: 우린 곧 서른인데 넌 고작 3명밖에 안 만나봤잖아

translation.en: Three. My 13-year-old niece has more experience than you, which is not cool.
translation.ko: 좋은 얘기는 아닌데 13살 조카도 너보다 많이 만났더라

translation.en: Seriously, Ingrid… [scoffs]
translation.ko: 잉그리드, 로펌 파트너가 네 인생의 전부는 아니잖아

translation.en: …life is not just about making partner. You gotta get out there and live a little.
translation.ko: 잉그리드, 로펌 파트너가 네 인생의 전부는 아니잖아 밖에 나가서 인생을 좀 즐기라고

translation.en: I will. After I make junior partner.
translation.ko: 그럴 거야 주니어 파트너만 되고 나서

translation.en: Speaking of, I've got a department meeting.
Good luck with you-know-who. And I don't mean Marty Adler.
translation.ko: 그 사람이랑 잘해 봐 마티 애들러 말고

translation.en: I want this deal. I'm your guy.
translation.ko: 내가 적임자인 거 같네 내가 맡을게

translation.en: [man 2] Tyler, we all want you on this case, but we need a reason to take Gavin off.
translation.ko: 타일러, 네가 맡아주면 좋은데 개빈을 내보낼 이유가 없어

translation.en: Okay. Hey, look. Not only have I pitched six new clients,
I started reading Vogue, Teen Vogue, and Women's Wear Daily when I was 11.
translation.ko: 난 11살 때부터 '보그' 같은 여성 패션 잡지를 읽었고

translation.en: I know Alexander McQueen didn't know couture until Givenchy,
translation.ko: 알렉산더 맥퀸이 오뜨꾸뛰르를 지방시에서 처음 배운 것도 알아

translation.en: and unlike Gavin Dunmore, I actually know the difference between polyester and wool.
translation.ko: 게다가 개빈 던모어랑은 달리 폴리에스터와 울의 차이도 알지

translation.en: [man 2] Fine. It's yours.
You won't be sorry.
Luxe for Raymond Vanderlin.
Yes! Remember when you're running Luxury Goods,
I want a huge discount on all client products.
translation.ko: 모든 고객 상품 할인해 줘야 해

translation.en: Girl, you won't need it because you'll be running this place.
translation.ko: 그럴 필요 없을걸 넌 이 로펌 운영하고 있을 거니까

translation.en: By the way, can you believe there is not one but two Asian American first-years?
translation.ko: 근데 신입 중에 아시아계 미국인이 두 명이나 있는 거 알고 있어?

translation.en: Wait. What?
Don't they annihilate each other in a flash of energy and release a photon?
translation.ko: 에너지 섬광으로 서로 죽이고는 광자를 내뿜지는 않았어?

translation.en: Come say hi to the kids at the reception tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 신입 환영 파티에서 인사라도 하라고

translation.en: Not if I get on Marty Adler's new deal.
translation.ko: 마티 애들러의 새 거래 맡게 되면 못 가지

translation.en: -[telephone ringing] -[exhales]
I'm so sorry. [scoffs]
Hey.
Hi. [chuckles]
Ingrid.
Ingrid Yun?
Jeff Murphy. It's a pleasure to meet you.
We've met. Jane and Tony's wedding?
translation.ko: 제인이랑 토니 결혼식에서 만난 적 있잖아요

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Of course. Yeah.
-You don't remember. -No, I do. Of course, I do.
No. You had on that dress, right? Very pretty dress.
Oh, that pink thing?
That's the one. Yeah.
It was blue.
Well, I had a lot to drink that night.
Apparently.
I didn't do anything embarrassing, did I?
No. You were an absolute gentleman.
Was I?
Is that letter or spirit of the law, Counselor?
Clearly you're not compos mentis, so I'll let you off with a warning.
translation.ko: 제정신은 아닌 것 같으니 경고만 하고 보내주는 거예요

translation.en: -This time. -How magnanimous of you.
You're the transfer from London.
Guilty as charged.
I take it you're in M&A too. What year are you in?
translation.ko: 인수합병 팀인 거 같은데 얼마나 됐어요?

translation.en: -Sixth. -So you're the competition.
-Don't flatter yourself. -You think you're that good?
translation.ko: - 너무 자만하지 말아요 - 실력이 좋나 봐요?

translation.en: Better.
Yun, should we be jealous?
Jeff Murphy. Just transferred from across the pond.
-Dan Fallon. -Todd Ames. You're from London?
-Um, well, thereabouts. -I used to summer in Kent.
translation.ko: - 그 부근이에요 - 여름엔 켄트에 가곤 했죠

translation.en: Oh yeah. I spent a lot of time in Knole Park.
I'm Hunter, like the green.
[Murphy] Nice to meet you, Hunter.
[man 3] Mr. Adler. Ma… Marty. Marty Adler.
-[Dan] Oh God. -I'm Caleb Sanders.
I'm a first-year here at Parsons.
I am really excited to be here. [chuckles]
May I ask a question?
Don't fucking ask permission to ask a question.
Just ask the fucking question.
-[chuckles] Of course. -[man 4] Come on, man
So in intellectual property law, we studied the Lexion-Huntsman case,
and how you handled the patent issues was brilliant. And I--
translation.ko: 특허 문제를 해결하신 방법이 엄청 기발했고…

translation.en: Stop. Stop talking.
Sanders, right?
No one's buying your wide-eyed ingénue act.
translation.ko: 아무도 네 순진한 척에 속아주지 않아

translation.en: -It's manipulative and a cliché. -[chuckles]
And stop laughing. It's making me mad. Laughter is a coward's expression of fear.
translation.ko: 그리고 웃지 마, 돌아버리겠으니까 겁먹은 찌질이나 웃는 거야

translation.en: Bye.
You know, I've asked them to move this paragraph three times.
translation.ko: 이 문단 옮기라고 세 번이나 말했잖아

translation.en: They really should go over Marty Adler in orientation.
translation.ko: 신입들은 마티 애들러 오리엔테이션 들어야 한다니까

translation.en: -Sorry. -Read your audience, pal.
-[Hunter] Beautiful. -You in for bingo?
-Sure. I'll go with "kick the tires." -I'm going with "circle the wagons."
translation.ko: - 난 '사전 확인'에 걸게 - 난 '방어 준비'로 할게

translation.en: -"Knock it out of the park" for me. -20 bucks buy-in.
Whoever's Phrase that Pays gets spoken first, wins. Feeling lucky?
translation.ko: 자신이 고른 구가 먼저 나오면 이기는 거예요, 할래요?

translation.en: Sure. Let's go with "slippery slope."
I thought you were the competition.
Fair enough.
How about "align incentives." No. "Boil the ocean."
translation.ko: 그럼 '인센티브 조정'으로 할게요 아니, '프로젝트 확장'으로 하죠

translation.en: Ah, I don't know. "Most impactful."
-You did that last time. -And it's not really a phrase.
All right, people. Take your seats, please.
Let's go, you wanna work today or what?
translation.ko: 빨리, 오늘 일 안 할 거야?

translation.en: Let's start with the Alcor deal.
Last week, we went in, we kicked the tires,
this week, we're gonna take this baby out for a spin.
translation.ko: 지난주에 방문해서 사전 확인도 완료했으니 이번 주에는 시험 운행도 해볼 계획이다

translation.en: Which reminds me.
I want you to take care of the shell corporation
that we talked about this morning.
I need to take a deposition for my effing uncle. Okay?
translation.ko: 망할 삼촌 때문에 증언하러 가야 하거든

translation.en: On to new business.
Sun Corp, big-time energy conglomerate in Houston, is acquiring Min Enterprises.
translation.ko: 휴스턴의 에너지 대기업 선 코프가 민 엔터프라이즈를 인수하려 한다

translation.en: A clean-tech play for 2.9 billion.
[Dan] Whoo! That's real money. [Marty] This deal could make or break our year.
translation.ko: - 액수 장난 아니네 - 올해의 성패는 이번 건에 달렸다

translation.en: So nobody breathes a word of this.
-Are you available, Fallon? -Willing and able.
translation.ko: - 맡을 수 있겠나, 팰런? - 믿고 맡겨만 주세요

translation.en: [Marty] Excellent.
I can draft up a quick and dirty NDA, get that signed ASAP.
translation.ko: 최대한 빠른 서명을 위해 NDA 초안을 작성할 수 있습니다

translation.en: Great, Yun. So, Fallon, I want you to sit in on the kickoff this afternoon.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그럼 팰런은 오늘 오후 첫 미팅에 참석하도록 해

translation.en: Ted Lassiter, Sun Corp CEO, is coming at three o'clock.
translation.ko: 선 코프의 CEO, 테트 래시터가 3시 정각에 올 거야

translation.en: -Love to. -[Marty] Great.
I worked on an oil and gas client last year,
translation.ko: 전 작년에 석유 및 천연가스 고객을 맡았고

translation.en: Chevron divested its holdings in Mexico's Royale Oil.
translation.ko: 셰브런이 멕시코 로열 오일의 지분을 매각했기 때문에

translation.en: So I know all about family-owned energy and all those tricky regulatory issues.
translation.ko: 가족 소유 에너지 기업 및 까다로운 규제 문제에 밝습니다

translation.en: Great. Yes, Yun, you sit in on the kickoff as well.
translation.ko: 잘됐네, 윤 자네도 첫 미팅에 같이 참석해

translation.en: Make sure we're ready to go at three o'clock.
translation.ko: 3시에 진행할 수 있도록 준비 철저하게 해

translation.en: Absolutely. Yes. My pleasure.
And remember, this deal is highly confidential.
translation.ko: 그리고 이번 거래는 기밀 사항임을 명심해

translation.en: If anything leaks, the deal is done.
If this gets out, I will fucking tear up your license myself.
translation.ko: 그렇게 되면 너희 변호사 자격증을 내 손으로 직접 찢어버릴 거야

translation.en: We have billable hours. Let's work. Come on.
translation.ko: 고객에게 시간을 청구해야 하니 당장 시작하지

translation.en: [Dan] He's talking about you.
He looked at me?
This will be fun.
Why don't you run that NDA by me before the meeting?
Sure, Dan. Should I tell you when I take a shit too?
translation.ko: 물론이지, 댄 똥 쌀 때도 말해줄까?

translation.en: Oh, vulgar. Come on, Yun. Don't be like that.
One of us has to run point, and Marty called on me first, so…
translation.ko: 둘 중 한 명이 리드해야 하는데 마티가 날 먼저 불렀잖아

translation.en: I look forward to reviewing that NDA.
-Did he just call you a paralegal? -[sighs]
translation.ko: 방금 당신한테 보조나 하라고 한 거죠?

translation.en: Sometimes I just wanna punch Dan Fallon in his smug, entitled face.
translation.ko: 가끔은 저 우쭐거리는 얼굴을 패주고 싶다니까요

translation.en: Welcome to the jungle, London.
translation.ko: 정글에 온 걸 환영해요, 런던 총각

translation.en: Oh, don't worry.
-I can see who the real competition is. -[Ingrid sighs]
[Ingrid] Justin, they're coming soon. Get off your phone.
translation.ko: 저스틴, 곧 도착할 거야 전화기 꺼

translation.en: You're early.
If you're early, you're on time. If you're on time, you're late.
translation.ko: 일찍 오면 제시간에 온 거고 제시간에 오면 지각이죠

translation.en: Punctuality is a virtue.
Ted Lassiter.
Hey. Um, Justin Coleman.
[Lassiter] Justin, nice to see you.
When you get a sec, can we get some Pellegrino brought up?
translation.ko: 시간 날 때 탄산수 좀 가져다줄래요?

translation.en: Of course. Justin, please call dining services and let them know.
Yeah.
Well, shoot. [chuckles]
Ingrid Yun. I'm the senior associate on the deal. It's great to meet you, Ted.
translation.ko: 선임 변호사, 잉그리드 윤입니다 만나 뵙게 되어 영광입니다, 테드

translation.en: Ted Lassiter. No hard feelings, I hope.
translation.ko: 테드 래시터입니다 기분 상하지 않았으면 좋겠네요

translation.en: You just don't look a day over 18 to me. You folks are lucky that way, right?
translation.ko: 보기에는 18살도 안 돼 보이거든요 동양인의 장점이죠, 안 그래요?

translation.en: -[scoffs] -This is my general counsel. That's Mark Traynor.
translation.ko: 이쪽은 제 법률 고문인 마크 트레이너입니다

translation.en: -Ted. [chuckles] -[Lassiter] Marty!
-Good to see you. -Good to see you.
How are you, Mark? This is Dan Fallon, senior associate.
translation.ko: 잘 지냈어요, 마크? 여기는 댄 팰런 선임 변호사입니다

translation.en: -Hi. -[Lassiter] Hi, Dan.
You've met Ingrid Yun. Brought my best and my brightest for you.
translation.ko: 잉그리드 윤은 만났군요 최고의 브레인을 데려왔죠

translation.en: Shall we?
[Dan] Ted, when I was on MacKenzie, I ran so many Liquid Natural Gas models,
translation.ko: 테드, 전 매켄지에 있을 때 액화 천연가스 모델을 하도 돌려본 나머지

translation.en: I was dreaming accretion and dilution analysis in my sleep.
translation.ko: 자면서도 응축과 희석을 분석하는 꿈을 꿨다니까요

translation.en: It always helps to have someone who knows how we run the numbers.
translation.ko: 계산 잘하는 사람이 있으면 언제나 도움이 되죠

translation.en: So, what's happening with their top execs?
Most of 'em are parachuting out,
but we are mainly interested in keeping Jack Barstow on.
translation.ko: 우린 잭 바스토를 붙잡기 위해 총력을 기울이고 있어요

translation.en: -Franklin Min's right-hand man. -That's right
Barstow spent three years slaving away to get their offshore drilling ops running.
translation.ko: 바스토는 연안 시추 작업을 위해 3년을 노예처럼 일만 했는데

translation.en: And now he learns old man Min's lookin' to sell?
translation.ko: 우두머리인 민이 회사를 팔려고 한다면 어떨까요?

translation.en: I bet he's pissed.
Barstow was seen meeting with Ken Fox of Chevron on Monday.
translation.ko: 바스토는 월요일에 셰브런의 켄 폭스를 만났으니

translation.en: If you want Barstow, we definitely need a key-man provision.
translation.ko: 바스토를 잡으려면 핵심 인물 조항이 꼭 필요합니다

translation.en: What'd I tell you, Ted? The best and the brightest.
-It's a problem. -There's no problems here today.
translation.ko: - 머리가 아프네요 - 오늘은 머리 아플 일 없습니다

translation.en: I know you're new, but paralegals are supposed to sit by the wall, not at the table.
translation.ko: 신입이라 몰랐겠지만 보조는 테이블에 앉는 거 아니야

translation.en: Okay. Whatever.
Ted, your junior year game against the Bulldogs is legendary.
translation.ko: 테드, 3학년 시절에 참가하신 불독과의 경기는 진짜 전설이에요

translation.en: Five goals, four assists, six caused turnovers.
translation.ko: 다섯 골에 어시스트 네 개 여섯 번의 턴 오버 유도까지

translation.en: -You play? -I was a midfielder.
-Gerri Hayes was our head coach. -No kidding.
Gerri was our assistant coach back in the day.
translation.ko: 당시에 제리는 우리 팀 수석 코치였거든

translation.en: Gerry's my man.
He actually retired a few years ago. But I see him every year at the game.
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 은퇴하긴 했지만 매년 경기에서 만나죠

translation.en: -[Lassiter] Well, say hi to him for me. -Will do.
All right. Go Crimson.
"Go Crimson."
[Ingrid] Do you think Marty will be at the first-year drinks?
translation.ko: 신입 환영 파티에 마티가 올 거 같아?

translation.en: Don't change the subject. Jeff Murphy doesn't remember you?
translation.ko: 말 돌리지 말고 제프 머피가 널 기억 못 한다고?

translation.en: If he does, he's not letting on.
Are we talking about Mr. Pineapple Marzipan?
translation.ko: 혹시 파인애플 마지팬 씨 얘기하고 있는 거면

translation.en: Be careful with that one, Ing.
Wait. What? Just this morning you were all about true love and soulmates.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에는 진정한 사랑이니 소울메이트니 하더니 갑자기?

translation.en: Before I learned he was pretending not to remember.
translation.ko: 그건 그 자식이 모르는 척하기 전이고

translation.en: I don't care if he's the devil.
When's the last time our girl's been hot and bothered?
translation.ko: 얘가 안절부절못했던 게 언제인지 기억은 나?

translation.en: When she found out she could take Trusts and Estates and IP as a 2L.
translation.ko: 로스쿨 2학년 때 상속법과 지식재산권 수업을 받게 됐을 때?

translation.en: Or when they extended the library hours to 24/7?
Or when the Law Review went monthly instead of quarterly?
Or when the Law Rev--
Okay, okay, okay! I get it.
But he doesn't remember,
so even if I wanted to, it's clear he doesn't feel the same.
translation.ko: 내가 원한다고 해도 상대는 다른 감정일 게 분명하잖아

translation.en: Ugh, I need a drink.
[Ingrid] Hi, Javi.
Thank you.
Ingrid. Such an old-fashioned name.
My parents saw Casablanca on their first date.
translation.ko: 부모님이 첫 데이트 때 카사블랑카를 보셨거든요

translation.en: So you're a workaholic and a romantic.
translation.ko: 그래서 일에 미쳐 살면서도 낭만을 좇는군요

translation.en: The film's about doing the right thing.
translation.ko: 영화 내용은 옳은 일을 하라는 거잖아요

translation.en: We're in M&A. Not a lot of room for that sort of thing.
translation.ko: 우린 인수합병 팀이고 그럴 여유가 많지는 않을걸요

translation.en: Thank you.
So you're a cynic.
Idealism doesn't pay the rent.
So you're in it for the money.
translation.ko: 그럼 돈 때문에 여기 온 거예요?

translation.en: What else?
What?
Like you need it.
Oh Come on, Murphy. You summer in Kent just like…
just like him.
[Dan] I know. What's this world coming to?
I'm nothing like him, Ingrid.
I've always been on the outside looking in.
Just like you.
Tell me, why are you in law?
-Laws are what we value. -Mm-hmm.
Murder is bad. Stealing is bad.
Forgetting people you met at a wedding is bad.
translation.ko: 결혼식에서 만난 사람을 잊어버리는 것도 나쁘고요

translation.en: Is that illegal in the States?
It should be.
Francine. Jesus, it's more old-fashioned than Ingrid.
translation.ko: "프랜신 린든호프 선 코프에 대한 정보 없어요?" 프랜신이라니 잉그리드보다 더 예스러운 이름도 있네요

translation.en: And reading other people's texts is definitely illegal.
translation.ko: 남의 문자 읽는 건 완전히 불법인데요

translation.en: [Dan] London.
See you around, Miss Bergman.
-[man 5] Can I get an Old-Fashioned? -[Javi] Yep.
You look way too nice to be friends with Dan.
translation.ko: 댄이랑 친구라기엔 너무 친절한 것 같네요

translation.en: [scoffs] The wise learn the most from their enemies.
translation.ko: 현명한 사람은 적에게서 가장 많이 배우죠

translation.en: Are you a philosopher or a lawyer?
Yes.
You… you remind me of a professor I had.
He was into philosophy and law.
Thomas Nagel.
Wait. The Thomas Nagel?
-You know him? -[Ingrid chuckles]
He was my thesis advisor on new theories of the mind, starting with his essay--
translation.ko: 제 정신 이론 논문 교수셨어요 시작 부분에 교수님의 에세이인…

translation.en: -"What Is It Like to Be a Bat?" -Yes!
I was obsessed with the mind-body problem.
translation.ko: 제가 심신의 상관관계에 관해 푹 빠져있었거든요

translation.en: Nick Laren.
Ingrid Yun.
So, uh, wha… what is it like to be Ingrid Yun?
translation.ko: 그럼 잉그리드 윤이 된다는 건 어떤 걸까요?

translation.en: Hmm. That's the problem.
No matter how close you and I ever get,
you can never truly know what it's like to be me.
translation.ko: 당신은 제가 되는 기분을 절대 알 수 없으니까요

translation.en: -Or I you. -Right.
The red I see will never be the same red you see, so why bother?
translation.ko: 같은 색도 서로 다르게 보이는데 굳이 궁금할 필요가 있을까요?

translation.en: Right. I've no way of knowing if my brain isn't in a vat somewhere
translation.ko: 맞아요, 내 뇌가 어떤 통에 들어있는 건지

translation.en: and all thisisn't just some simulation.
translation.ko: 이 모든 게 그저 시뮬레이션인지 알 길이 없으니까요

translation.en: I had a serious case of solipsism in college.
That was before I realized we're all here by sheer happenstance,
translation.ko: 그때는 우리 모두가 이곳에 있는 게 순전한 우연이며

translation.en: an accident of string theory, a hiccup on a probability function.
translation.ko: 끈 이론과 확률 함수의 우연이라는 사실을 깨닫기 전이었죠

translation.en: But I tell myself, in the face of the heat death of the universe
translation.ko: 하지만 자신에게 말해요 우주의 열역학적 소멸을 앞두고도

translation.en: that we must supply our own light and our own wine.
-I'll drink to that. -[both chuckle]
Sorry. Back to the salt mines.
Hey. So I know that free will is just an illusion,
translation.ko: 저기, 자유 의지가 환상일 뿐이란 걸 알지만

translation.en: but what are you doing Friday?
Hopefully not babysitting my paralegal.
I'm going to a thing at the Plaza. Would you like to join me?
Yes. I'd love to. [chuckles]
Great.
See you Friday.
-Great. -If the simulation doesn't crash before.
-Right. -[both chuckle]
[woman ] Ingrid, have you heard from Marlena?
[in English] I just want to be sure she's okay.
translation.ko: 무슨 일 있는 건 아닌지 걱정돼서 그래

translation.en: Hey. It's Lina. Leave a message.
-Namaste, bitches. -[voicemail beeps]
Hey. It's me. Mom's worried about you.
Just let her know you're okay.
♪ Staring back at me in the mirror ♪
translation.ko: "리나 별일 없어, 바빠서 그래" "잉그리드 엄마한테 전화드렸어?"

translation.en: [podcast host] So next, what is a MAC clause?
A MAC clause is a Material Adverse Change clause.
It's a change in circumstance that affects a bargain after the deal is signed,
translation.ko: 거래에 서명은 하였으나 아직 마무리되기 이전에 협상에 영향을 주는 환경의 변화를 말합니다

translation.en: but before it's been closed.
Something like an embargo, or a new tax law, or a regulatory change…
translation.ko: 수출 금지 또는 신규 세법이나 규제 변화와 같은…

translation.en: [Ingrid] I want all the phase-one and phase-two reports.
The full set, not abridged.
The IP agreements and the lease and will docs too.
translation.ko: 지식재산 계약서랑 임대차 계약서, 유언 서류도

translation.en: Why aren't you writing this down?
Sorry to interrupt. Your mother's on the line. Sounds urgent.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 어머님 전화 왔는데 급한 것 같아서요

translation.en: I've put her through on your cell.
[in English] No one has talked to her in three days, Ingrid.
translation.ko: 통화한 사람이 아무도 없어 벌써 3일째라고, 잉그리드

translation.en: Okay. I'll check on her.
I want those docs by one o'clock.
Yes, ma'am.
Hey, it's me. Again.
Look, I'm outside your building. If you don't call me back in 5 minutes…
translation.ko: 지금 너희 집 건물 앞인데 5분 안에 전화 안 하면…

translation.en: Where are you? Text me you're alive, or I'll have to tell Mom.
translation.ko: 어디야? 살아있다고 문자라도 해 아니면 엄마한테 말할 거야

translation.en: If you're on time, you're late.
Marty Adler dropped by.
-When? -[woman 3] An hour ago.
I told him you'd be right back, but I think he went looking for Dan.
translation.ko: 금방 올 거라고 했더니 댄을 찾으러 갔어요

translation.en: [Dan] He shoots! He shoots!
Go fetch.
[Todd] I wanna be a baller, man.
[Dan] He shoots! He shoots!
Aw, Yun, that was a perfect three-pointer.
-Did Marty stop by? -Yeah. You just missed him.
What did he want?
Just checking in, running through any potential red flags.
translation.ko: 그냥 얘기 좀 하고 다른 잠재 위험은 없는지 확인했어

translation.en: I thought that was the two o'clock.
Yeah. We just did it over lunch.
translation.ko: 맞아, 근데 그냥 점심 먹으면서 해치웠지

translation.en: -So what were the red flags? -You know, land lease stuff…
translation.ko: - 그래서 어떤 위험이 있었는데? - 알잖아, 토지 임대가 어쩌고…

translation.en: He was interested in what could come outta left field.
translation.ko: 마티가 생각지 못했던 건 뭐든 관심을 보이더라고

translation.en: Did he mean "intangibles" like "goodwill" assets?
The Mins have a very valuable brand
and great relationships with their suppliers.
translation.ko: 공급 업체와의 관계도 상당히 좋은 편이거든

translation.en: Ball.
Relax. I got it covered.
You know that Plaza thing you're going to with Nick tomorrow night?
translation.ko: 내일 밤에 닉이랑 플라자 가기로 했잖아?

translation.en: I asked Rachel to go with me, and she flat-out said no.
translation.ko: 레이철한테 같이 가자고 했다가 적나라하게 까였어

translation.en: Is it because I'm not Jewish?
It's because you're an arrogant ass, Dan.
Yeah. Women love that.
She likes the artsy type.
I don't know, maybe we're attracted to what we wanna be, but we aren't.
translation.ko: 글쎄 보통은 본인이 바라는 모습에 끌리겠지만 우린 아니거든

translation.en: Speaking of which, you have an awesome dress for tomorrow, right?
translation.ko: 말이 나왔으니 말인데 내일 입을 예쁜 드레스는 있지?

translation.en: I was gonna go out and buy one, but it's tight. We have Sun Corp tomorrow.
translation.ko: 하나 사려고 했는데 내일 선 코프 때문에 시간이 없네

translation.en: Like I said, Yun, relax.
I got it covered.
I'm coming for you! Hey!
MVP, back in the game!
All right, all right, all right. Check it up, check it up.
Sorry, Marty. Didn't mean to interrupt.
I just wanted to drop off the executed NDA. Sorry I missed--
Lassiter is moving tomorrow up to 9:00 a.m. Is that gonna be a problem?
No. No problem.
Be around later if I need you?
translation.ko: 오늘 나중에라도 필요하면 올 수 있겠나?

translation.en: -Yes. I'll be here all night. -Good.
Anytime, Marty.
[Marty] Roberta?
I'm sorry. I can't make it tomorrow.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 내일 못 갈 거 같아요

translation.en: Aw, you got a better offer?
Damn. That Tom Nagel does know how to cut a rug.
translation.ko: 이런, 토머스 교수님한테 배운 춤 솜씨를 보여주려 했는데

translation.en: Just come out for an hour.
I'll have you back at the office before you can say "epistemology."
I'd love to, but I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 그러고 싶은데 안 될 거 같아요

translation.en: I really am.
Look, um… [clears throat]
…we… we at the philosophy department have very specific taste.
You'd be surprised how hard it is
to find someone so conversant in mind-body theory, so…
translation.ko: 정통한 사람을 찾는다는 게 얼마나 힘든지 모를 거예요

translation.en: we won't be filling the position with any other candidates.
translation.ko: 그러니 다른 사람을 데려올 생각은 없으니까

translation.en: If you change your mind, swing by.
Thanks.
[podcast host] In the context of lending transactions,
a clause which acts as a catch-all provision
and aims to allow the lender to call a default
translation.ko: 채무자의 직위나 상황에 부정적인 변화가 있을 경우

translation.en: if there's an adverse change in the borrower's position or circumstance…
translation.ko: 대출 기관이 채무 불이행을 선언할 수 있도록 하는 조항으로…

translation.en: Ted, Mark brought me up to speed about your budgetary concerns.
translation.ko: 테드, 예산 문제와 관련해서 마크와 얘기 나눴습니다

translation.en: I had two senior associates on the matter
translation.ko: 문제를 좋은 방향으로 해결해 나가기 위해

translation.en: to make sure we were steering the ship correctly.
But going forward, we will keep just one.
-[Lassiter] Much appreciated. -[Marty] So…
For starters, I think we should add in language about intangible goodwill assets.
translation.ko: 먼저, 무형 영업권 자산에 대한 언어를 추가해야 합니다

translation.en: Min's brand is very valuable and they have good relationships with key suppliers.
translation.ko: 민의 브랜드는 가치도 있고 주요 공급 업체와의 관계도 좋죠

translation.en: [Marty] Good idea. Thank you, Dan.
I don't see a MAC clause. A Material Adverse Change clause.
translation.ko: MAC 조항이 보이지 않네요 중대한 부정적 변화 조항이요

translation.en: It's a change in circumstance that affects a bargain
translation.ko: 거래에 서명은 하였으나 아직 마무리되기 이전에

translation.en: after a deal's signed, but before it's closed.
translation.ko: 협상에 영향을 주는 환경 변화를 말합니다

translation.en: Something like an embargo, or a new tax law, or regulatory change.
translation.ko: 수출 금지나 신규 세법 또는 규제 변화 등이 있죠

translation.en: It's always good to have a well-defined MAC clause.
translation.ko: 잘 정의된 MAC 조항은 언제나 도움이 됩니다

translation.en: Mm-hmm. And speaking of regulatory,
my buddy, Winston, is actually at the Department of Energy, in fossil fuels.
Winston and I were in the Spee together.
He's a very good friend,
and it never hurts to have a friendly face at the DOE.
translation.ko: 에너지부에 아는 얼굴 있다고 나쁠 건 없지 않을까요?

translation.en: Well, that could be very valuable indeed.
Of course, that would all have to be official.
Of course.
Okay. I think it makes sense to have Dan stay on and run point.
Thank you, Yun. So we have a few…
translation.ko: 수고했어, 윤 그러면 이제 남은 건…

translation.en: Thank you, Yun.
[Marty] I wanna get into the stock price.
I wanna get into the shell corporations, I wanna get into the oil business.
translation.ko: 페이퍼 컴퍼니와 석유 사업의 정보도 필요합니다

translation.en: You stole my idea. "Intangibles"? "Goodwill assets"?
You cheated.
Not really.
Just different rules.
Hey. Sorry, just got your text.
I'm off the Sun Corp deal.
Dan won.
Fair play or lacrosse?
He's got some Finals Club buddy who works at the Department of Energy.
translation.ko: 에너지부에서 일하는 대학 시절 친구가 있다는 거야

translation.en: Sun Corp was my ticket to making partner. I'm sorry, Ing.
-Maybe next year. -We both know it's up-or-out here.
translation.ko: - 내년을 노려야지 - 승진 못 하면 끝인 거 알잖아

translation.en: If I don't make partner, everyone will know I couldn't cut it.
translation.ko: 이번에도 파트너 못 따면 다들 내 능력을 의심할 거고

translation.en: I can't just lateral over to another firm.
translation.ko: 다른 로펌으로 이직도 안 될 거야

translation.en: I'll be like Tara Grottaglia and go in-house at a urinary-device company.
translation.ko: 태라 그로타글리아처럼 소변줄 회사 사내 변호사나 하겠지

translation.en: I'll be… I'll be nobody.
Ugh! I mean, who do I have to be to win here? Dan Fallon?
translation.ko: 여기서 살아남으려면 댄 팰런처럼 해야 하는 거야?

translation.en: I play the game as well as he does. Better. Turns out they play by different rules.
translation.ko: 내가 그 자식보다 더 잘했는데 규칙이 다르다는 소리나 듣고

translation.en: I get it, Ing.
You know I do.
Oh God.
I've wanted this more than anything.
Ever since I first saw New York.
What am I supposed to do?
I don't know.
But look on the bright side.
You're free to have fun tonight with us at the Plaza.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 플라자에서 우리랑 신나게 놀 수 있잖아

translation.en: I canceled. [sobs]
-And I don't have a dress. -[sighs]
Guess who I'm calling?
I do live for this. I'm moving for this.
translation.ko: 이게 내 삶의 이유이자 날 움직이는 원동력이지

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's do this one.
-Well, I don't like that. -But we must do--
That! Yes, yes.
[Tyler] We must do a pink.
Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.
-I love this. -Me too.
-Drama. Audrey Hepburn vibe. -[Rachel] Oh my God.
translation.ko: - 이건 드라마 느낌이다 - 우와 오드리 헵번 스타일도 있네

translation.en: Oh my God. You can.
Okay. Bye.
-I love a shoulder moment. -I live for this.
translation.ko: - 어깨 부분 너무 마음에 든다 - 이런 거 보려고 산다니까

translation.en: I love it.
Oh, our little girl's growing up.
Way to break a dry spell with not one, but two smoke shows.
translation.ko: 죽은 연애 세포를 한 명도 아닌 두 명의 훈남으로 살리다니

translation.en: Well, I'm Team Nick. I'd love to get his sweet Loro Piana all up in a bunch.
translation.ko: 난 닉이 좋아 그 멋진 로로피아나 옷을 마구 더듬어 보고 싶어

translation.en: Okay.
Wait. So no one's Team Marzipan?
-Eh… -I mean…
-You're going home alone. -[Ingrid] Oh my God.
-[Tyler] Stunning. -Looking like that, I'd say option C.
translation.ko: - 예쁘다 - 그러게, 드디어 찾은 거 같네

translation.en: Team "All of the Above." -I love it. -Absolutely.
translation.ko: - 진짜 중의 진짜네 - 엄청 마음에 들어

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -It's so perfect.
That's how you get a man.
Is this your business casual?
I'm happy you decided to come.
Yeah. I am too.
[woman 6] Look, there's Nick.
[woman 7] Great party, Nick.
-[man 6] Lovely party, Nick. -Is this your party?
translation.ko: - 파티 마음에 들어요, 닉 - 당신이 주인공이에요?

translation.en: I'm a… I'm a host.
[woman ] Ingrid.
Nick, this is Francine Lindenhoff. She writes for the Financial Times.
-Oh hey. -Still no comment?
-About what? -Excuse me…
Ingrid, please excuse me.
I'm running a piece Monday. Sun Corp's bidding for Min.
translation.ko: 월요일에 기사 나갈 거예요 선 코프가 민에 입찰한다면서요

translation.en: Maybe.
Ted Lassiter was seen entering Park Avenue Plaza twice this week.
translation.ko: 이번 주, 테드 래시터가 두 번이나 파크 애비뉴 플라자에 들렀어요

translation.en: Maybe he likes artisanal espresso in the lobby.
translation.ko: 로비 카페의 에스프레소가 마음에 들었나 보죠

translation.en: What makes you think I'd be on the deal?
You were point on Parsons' last energy case.
translation.ko: 파슨스의 마지막 에너지 사건을 당신이 맡았으니까요

translation.en: Francine, everyone knows Sun Corp's been sniffing around Min for years.
translation.ko: 프랜신, 선 코프가 수년 동안 민 주위를 맴돈 건 모두가 알아요

translation.en: It's not news.
You'll need a little more than that for a headline.
Come on, Ingrid. We can help each other out.
translation.ko: 말해줘요, 잉그리드 서로 도움 될 거라니까요

translation.en: I'm a good friend to have.
[Tyler] There you are.
Good luck.
Hey. At least you had time to get that dress.
translation.ko: 그래도 드레스 살 시간은 있었나 보네

translation.en: I did you a favor with Sun Corp.
translation.ko: 선 코프 건은 널 위해서 그런 거야

translation.en: Saved you from 100-hour work weeks. Is that what you really want?
Look.
We're gonna be 30 this year.
You're definitely not a bakkushan.
Use it before you lose it.
Tyler, does your boyfriend, Anthony, get invited to everything?
translation.ko: 타일러, 네 남친 앤서니는 빠지는 행사가 있긴 해?

translation.en: -Life of a politician. -And his fabulous plus-ones.
translation.ko: - 거의 정치인이지 - 게다가 멋진 파트너도 있잖아

translation.en: -Smile and say, "five million followers." -Oh! Oh, hey! [chuckles]
[Ingrid] "Faust and Mephistopheles"?
So what would you sell your soul for?
Maybe a kiss?
You know, "Lucifer" actually means "bringer of light."
Because meeting the devil illuminates the darkness within ourselves.
translation.ko: 그 이유가 악마를 만나면 내면의 어둠이 밝아져서래요

translation.en: -I love that we're both nerds. -[both chuckle]
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 괴짜라서 너무 좋네요

translation.en: Murphy. I see you already know your way around town.
Oh, I'd never miss a chance to see you in a pretty dress.
translation.ko: 예쁜 드레스 입은 당신의 모습을 놓치고 싶지 않았거든요

translation.en: Blue or pink.
[chuckles] Nick Laren, Jeff Murphy.
translation.ko: 여긴 닉 라렌이고 이쪽은 제프 머피예요

translation.en: We work together.
-Pleasure. This is Christina. -[Nick] Oh.
Are you having a good time?
For the price of entry,
I would have at least hoped that the bubbly was vintage, but no go.
translation.ko: 빈티지 샴페인 정도는 나올 줄 알았는데 아니더라고요

translation.en: [Nick] Oh I'm sure we can manage that.
Thanks, but, honestly, I think we might bounce.
translation.ko: 고맙습니다만 이만 가봐야 할 거 같네요

translation.en: This soirée's a little too self-satisfied even for me.
translation.ko: 너무 자기만족에 치중한 파티라 저조차도 적응이 힘들어서요

translation.en: Nick is actually one of the hosts.
Oh really? So I can complain to you directly about your taste in music.
translation.ko: 그래요? 그럼 음악 취향에 대해 직접 불만을 말씀드려도 되겠군요

translation.en: Well, if you like, join the host committee next year,
then you can ensure the entertainment and food are up to your standards.
translation.ko: 접객 및 음식의 기준을 원하시는 대로 맞출 수 있습니다

translation.en: For a nominal donation, of course.
Oh, I hope the chocolate's not too self-satisfied for you.
translation.ko: 이 초콜릿은 자기만족이 너무 지나치지 않았으면 좋겠네요

translation.en: Marzipan.
So, Ingrid.
You having a good time?
Actually, I'm having a great time.
Come on. I wanna dance.
Have fun.
I'm so thirsty. I'll be right back.
-[man 7] Upsy-daisy. -[Ingrid] Sorry. Here. Let me help you.
Thanks.
Winston Keil. Buddy of Nick Laren's.
Oh, how do you know Nick?
Went to school together.
Then worked for his dad before I went to the Department of Energy.
translation.ko: 그 후에 에너지부로 가기 전에 닉의 아버지 밑에서 일했죠

translation.en: Winston. Department of… Do you know Dan Fallon?
Dan's my man. He's on fire with this Sun Corp deal.
translation.ko: 댄이랑 친하죠 선 코프 거래 때문에 바쁘잖아요

translation.en: -You know about it. -All 2.9 billion of it.
But you didn't hear it from me.
Hear what?
It was nice meeting you, but I got a thirsty lady waiting.
translation.ko: 만나서 반가웠지만 목마른 숙녀가 기다리고 있어서요

translation.en: Thanks for your help.
My pleasure.
[Ingrid whispers] Francine.
Nick, I'm so sorry, but I have to go.
translation.ko: 닉, 미안한데 가봐야 할 거 같아요

translation.en: Well, I promise my hip-hop's better.
translation.ko: 저 힙합 댄스는 더 잘 춰요

translation.en: No. It's just I… I have to work.
I'll walk you out.
It's okay. You're a host, so host.
Well, that was worth the price.
He knew the purchase price.
If that gets out before the term sheet's signed…
translation.ko: 거래 조건에 서명하기 전에 유출이라도 되면…

translation.en: [Rachel] He was drunk. It won't come out.
But if it leaks, there won't be a deal.
At least not for Parsons.
If you do this, won't Dan get in trouble?
translation.ko: 이렇게 하면 댄이 곤란해지는 거 아니야?

translation.en: I'm protecting the deal and protecting the client. The firm.
translation.ko: 난 거래와 고객, 회사를 보호하려는 거야

translation.en: Okay. Well, do what you have to do, then.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그럼 해야 할 일을 해

translation.en: You got this.
Excuse me for a second. Uh you're a bit overdressed.
Yun, what's going on?
I was at the Plaza, and ran into a friend who works at the Financial Times.
translation.ko: 플라자에서 파이낸셜 타임스에 근무하는 친구를 만났는데

translation.en: They said they're running a piece on Sun Corp Monday.
translation.ko: 월요일에 선 코프 관련 기사를 쓴대요

translation.en: What?
Justin?
Yeah. His dad, Leonard Coleman, is a good friend. Wait, wait.
translation.ko: 맞아, 아버지인 레너드 콜먼이랑 친구 사이거든, 그건 됐고

translation.en: Who is their source?
I think someone at the DOE.
Dan's guy.
W… Well, everyone knows that Lassiter's been looking for an LNG play.
translation.ko: 래시터가 LNG 회사를 매수하려고 찾아다닌 건 누구나 알잖아

translation.en: He knows the purchase price. Fuck! Fuck!
If I may, I have an idea.
Great. Come inside.
Okay. So, I'm basically thinking that…
Looks like you had an even crazier night than me.
translation.ko: 나보다 더 뜨거운 밤을 보낸 거 같네

translation.en: Lina, what… what are you doing here?
I dropped out.
What? Why?
Juilliard's a bastion of outdated posers who've internalized the patriarchy.
translation.ko: 줄리아드에는 가부장적 사고에 쩐 늙은 밥맛들만 득실거리거든

translation.en: Lina, you can't just waltz in here.
If you're gonna start lecturing, I'd really rather sleep in the park.
translation.ko: 잔소리할 거면 그냥 공원에서 자는 게 낫겠어

translation.en: Honestly, I'm too tired to deal with your drama right now.
translation.ko: 네 드라마에 장단 맞춰주기엔 내가 지금 너무 피곤하거든

translation.en: You can stay, but I'm gonna tell Mom you're here.
translation.ko: 그냥 여기서 지내 대신 엄마한테는 말할 거야

translation.en: Fine.
-I need to be back at the office. -Sure.
This deal could get me junior partner.
translation.ko: 이번 거래만 잘하면 주니어 파트너 될 수도 있거든

translation.en: I'll be back Monday.
Go! Go make junior president or whatever.
translation.ko: 그래, 가버려! 주니어 파무침인지 뭔지 하든가

translation.en: Have to get this term sheet signed before the article comes out.
translation.ko: 기사 뜨기 전에 서명 먼저 받아야 하는 상황이니까

translation.en: So, for the next 60 hours, you're mine. Let's get to work.
translation.ko: 앞으로 60시간 동안은 어디 갈 생각하지 마요 시작하죠

translation.en: Can you give me that other file? There.
…with this deal. $2.9 billion.
Look at this.
Can you get on the…
No message from them? I'm sure they'll be here any minute.
translation.ko: - 연락 온 거 없나요? - 몇 분 안에 도착할 겁니다

translation.en: [clears throat] I understand somebody asked for an autograph.
Thank you so much for helping expedite the process this weekend.
[Min] You remember my sons Carter, Min's general counsel, and Z.
translation.ko: 민의 법률 자문위원이자 제 아들인 카터와 Z 기억하시죠?

translation.en: Carter.
-What's up, man? -Good to see you. Z.
Shit.
I haven't worked this hard since… [scoffs] …law school.
translation.ko: 로스쿨 이후로 이렇게 열심히 일한 건 처음이네요

translation.en: But yeah, let's expedite the shit out of this.
-I wish my son were that spirited. -That's one word for it.
translation.ko: 제 아들도 저렇게 열정적이었으면 좋겠네요 저걸 열정이라고 부른다면요

translation.en: We hope the rest of the process will be less expedited, more prudent.
translation.ko: 나머지 과정은 서두르지 않고 좀 더 신중했으면 합니다

translation.en: [Z] Yes. We look forward to discussing your plans for integration,
especially regarding GreenTech.
Seeing as you've run roughshod over every previous attempt--
My sons and I look forward to our partnership.
[Marty] Excellent.
Shall we?
As you know, we've coordinated with the Financial Times
for an exclusive to help shape the message.
I guess we're engaged.
After these cats finish the paperwork, you can kiss the bride.
translation.ko: 서류 작업이 끝나면 진짜 한배를 타는 거죠

translation.en: Shall we meet halfway, Mr. Min?
Yes.
[Marty] We're gonna make this work.
translation.ko: "뉴스 속보 선 코프, 민 엔터프라이즈 인수" 다 잘될 겁니다

translation.en: -[Min] Excellent. -[Marty] It'll be wonderful.
-[Lassiter] Frank. -Ted.
-Thank you, Marty. -Congratulations.
Yun, what the hell?
If you're on time, you're late.
Well, what'd I tell you? Best and the brightest.
-Mm-hmm. -Yun'll run point and close the deal.
-That work for you? -[Lassiter] Sure. Why the hell not?
[Marty] Good. We'll get into due diligence and bring this baby home.
translation.ko: 그럼 기업실사 시작하고 거래 마무리하도록 하겠습니다

translation.en: What happened?
I played by your rules.
-[Marty] Anyone for a drink? -[Min] Best idea I've heard all day.
I hear congratulations are in order.
You single-handedly saved the Min deal.
Are those from the most eligible bachelor in New York?
translation.ko: 그건 뉴욕 최고의 신랑감이 보낸 건가요?

translation.en: It was just a date. [clears throat]
translation.ko: 그냥 데이트 한 번 한 거예요

translation.en: Francine.
Such an old-fashioned name.
Well, congratulations.
Thanks.
I do remember, by the way.
Rosecliff.
Marzipan. Pineapple.
I remember all of it.
